title: Liver Dumplings
beforeyoubegin: These are pretty much meatballs and are always part of a barley vegetable soup
time: Less than an hour, but you need to also do the soup
yields: Enough for about 4 quarts of soup
ingredients:
½ pound liver
1/2 onion
1 tablespoon parsley
½ teaspoon salt
Dash pepper
2 slices bread
1 egg
¼ cup flour
steps:
Place all ingredients besides the flour in the food processor
Pulse until blended
Shape into 2 inch balls, flatten a little
Roll in flour
Place on ungreased cookie sheet
Bake at 325 degrees for 15 to 20 minutes
Add to soup
Remove chicken from pot and cool.
notes:
Really does not have that much of a liver taste to it
Even though my dad hated liver, he ate these in the soup
